cards.title: Inquirer
powers: Draw a card. You may destroy one of your Ongoing cards. If you do, play a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: You have no idea what you're getting into, do you?
openingLines.ApostateCharacter: Let's see who really understands the truths of the world.

cards.title: The Lie they Tell Themselves
cards.body: After a Distortion card is destroyed, 1 non-Hero Target deals itself 1 Psychic Damage.

flavorQuotes.text: You don't need words to deceive.

cards.title: Undeniable Facts
cards.body: After one of your Distortion cards is destroyed, draw a card.

cards.title: "I'm a Mole-Person!"
body: When Inquirer would regain HP, increase the amount of HP regained by 1.
At the end of your turn, Inquirerer may deal 1 Target 1 Melee Damage.
At the start of your turn, you may place the top two cards of your trash on the bottom of your deck. If you do not, destroy this.

flavorQuotes.text: Why else would I be digging myself deeper into this pit?

cards.title: "I'm a Ninja!"
body: Increase Damage dealt by Inquirer by 1.
At the end of your turn, you may discard a card. If you do, use a power.
At the start of your turn, you may place the top two cards of your trash on the bottom of your deck. If you do not, destroy this.

flavorQuotes.text: How else could I have gotten up here?

cards.title: "I'm a Victorian!"
body: When you discard a card from your hand, discard the top card of your deck.
At the end of your turn, Inquirerer regains 1 HP.
At the start of your turn, you may place the top two cards of your trash on the bottom of your deck. If you do not, destroy this.

flavorQuotes.text: Where did you think the hat came from?

cards.title: Backup Plan
cards.powers: Inquirer deals 1 Target 1 Projectile Damage. Inquirer regains 1 HP. You may discard a card to draw a card.

flavorQuotes.text: Why wouldn't I keep a pistol on me?

cards.title: "You're Looking Pale!"
body: Play this card next to a non-Hero Target. That Target deals itself 4 Psychic Damage now.
When this card is destroyed, that Target regains 2 HP.
At the start of your turn, destroy this.

flavorQuotes.text: Just lay down for a little. Do you really think you can fight like that?

cards.title: "You're on Our Side!"
body: Play this card next to a non-Hero Target. That Target deals all other non-Hero Targets 2 Melee Damage now.
When this card is destroyed, that Target deals Inquirer 1 Melee Damage.
At the start of your turn, destroy this.

flavorQuotes.text: Get over here before they start blasting you! Didn't you get the updated orders?

cards.title: "I've Fixed the Wound!"
body: Play this card next to a Hero Target. That Target regains 5 HP now.
When this card is destroyed, that Target deals itself 2 Psychic Damage.
At the start of your turn, destroy this.

flavorQuotes.text: Of course it's patched up! You're still walking, aren't you?

cards.title: "Look! A Distraction!"
body: Play this card next to a non-Hero Target. That Target deals 1 other non-Hero Target 3 Melee Damage now.
When this card is destroyed, that Target deals Inquirer 1 Melee Damage.
At the start of your turn, destroy this.

flavorQuotes.text: Did you really think those reinforcements were yours?

cards.title: Until you Make It
body: Search your deck or trash for a persona card and put it into play. If you searched your deck, shuffle it.
You may draw a card.
You may play a Card.

flavorQuotes.text: Is it still a lie if it becomes the truth?

cards.title: Fisticuffs
body: Inquirer deals 1 Target 3 Melee Damage.
Inquirer Regains 2 HP.
Discard a card.

flavorQuotes.text: Why wouldn't I have a little practice in this?

cards.title: The Right Questions
body: Destroy an Ongoing or Environment card. If you do, you may play a Distortion card.
Put one of your Distortion cards back in your hand.

flavorQuotes.text: So, why did you believe me in the first place?

promoCards.title: Inquirer
powers: You may play an Ongoing card. Until the start of your next turn, non-target Distortions have a maximum HP of 3. Each Distortion deals 1 Target 1 Psychic Damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

promoCards.title: Inquirer
powers: Select a Distortion and put it on top of its deck. Play the top card of your deck.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.
